links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..100
formula: a(n) = (5*n)!/((4*n)!*(n)!).a(n) is asymptotic to c/sqrt(n)*(3125/256)^n, with c=sqrt(5/8/Pi)=0.44603102903819277863474159... - _Benoit Cloitre_, Jan 23 2008a(n) = C(5*n-1,n-1)*C(25*n^2,2)/(3*n*C(5*n+1,3)), n>0. - _Gary Detlefs_, Jan 02 2014G.f.: A(x)=x*B'(x)/B(x), where B(x)+1 is g.f. of A002294. - _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Oct 05 2015
prog: (MAGMA)[ Binomial(5*n,n): n in [0..100] ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 13 2011(Maxima)B(x):=sum(binomial(5*n,n-1)/n*x^n,n,1,30);taylor(x*diff(B(x),x)/B(x),x,0,10); /* _Vladimir Kruchinin_, Oct 05 2015 */(PARI) a(n) = binomial(5*n, n) \\ _Altug Alkan_, Oct 05 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
